page.title: 04SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: Most people have moved into this area for jobs,often because their company has moved to the area more suitable to the type of work they do.Other people moved to the area as it is nicer than very industrial areas or old estates.A lot of people from the place to place for social reasons but the major reason for moving is work which in today's society is a very important factor.Also we have found that people in our area would like the following changes:- { {1.}Transport to be cheaper. {2.}More sports facilities. {3.}Better playing areas. {4.}Buildings to be finished sooner {5.}A small cinema. A recently built roundabout has inproved the flow of local traffic.
